message:
SYSTEM: OntoDDB.pdf: Página 21
12/11/2009
OWL-DB OntoLoad
• Module for loading NEW ontologies on 
database
• OWL file as input
• Use of Jena API for ontology management
• Statements as means of communication 
with repository
• Capacity to load large ontologies
– NCI ontology: 500.000 statements
speaker: SYSTEM
